title: Numeric Tools | AIMA Development
intro: AIMA develops and uses a large proprietary library of dedicated cyclotron 6D-beam dynamics sofware tools to design innovative cyclotrons.

1.title: Agora - 6D
1.description: Agora 6D is a proprietary software developed by AIMA Development, specifically designed for the study of particle physics and cyclotrons.

2.description: CST Studio Suite is a proprietary software developed by Dassault Systèmes, designed for 3D electromagnetic simulation.

3.title: Solidworks – Dassault system
3.description: SolidWorks is a proprietary software developed by Dassault Systèmes, designed for 3D computer-aided design (CAD).

4.title: Codes Aster / Salomé Méca – EDF
4.description: Code_Aster is an open-source software developed by EDF (Electricité de France), dedicated to numerical simulation in structural mechanics and thermomechanics.
